ageCategory_y.Description: age category in 5-year bins from 15 to 45 and then a 15-year bin from 46-60 (variable categorised to preserve anonymization)

bai_1y.Description: Beck Anxiety Inventory, score at 1-year follow-up

bai_crossover.Description: Beck Anxiety Inventory, score after second treatment (crossover)

bai_post.Description: Beck Anxiety Inventory, score after first treatment

bai_pre.Description: Beck Anxiety Inventory, score before treatment

cgii_1y.Description: Clinical Global Impression-Improvement scale, rating at 1-year follow-up

cgii_post.Description: Clinical Global Impression-Improvement scale, rating after treatment

lsassr_1y.Description: Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale - self-report version, score at 1-year follow-up

lsassr_crossover.Description: Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale - self-report version, score after second treatment (crossover)

lsassr_post.Description: Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale - self-report version, score after first treatment

lsassr_pre.Description: Liebowitz Social Anxiety Scale - self-report version, score before treatment

madrss_1y.Description: Montgomery-≈sberg Depression Rating Scale, self-rated, score at 1-year follow-up

madrss_crossover.Description: Montgomery-≈sberg Depression Rating Scale, self-rated, score after second treatment (crossover)

madrss_post.Description: Montgomery-≈sberg Depression Rating Scale, self-rated, score after first treatment

madrss_pre.Description: Montgomery-≈sberg Depression Rating Scale, self-rated, score before treatment

qoli_1y.Description: Quality of Life Inventory, score at 1-year follow-up

qoli_crossover.Description: Quality of Life Inventory, score after second treatment (crossover)

qoli_post.Description: Quality of Life Inventory, score after first treatment

qoli_pre.Description: Quality of Life Inventory, score before treatment

sadDuration_y.Description: duration of social anxiety disorder (calculated by subtracting age at onset from age at scanning)

scid_sad_diagnosis_1y.Description: Diagnosis of social anxiety disorder as detemined by the Structured Clinical Interview for DSM-5 Disorders (SCID) at 1-year follow-up

sias_1y.Description: Social Interaction and Anxiety Scale, score at 1-year follow-up

sias_crossover.Description: Social Interaction and Anxiety Scale, score after first treatment

sias_post.Description: Social Interaction and Anxiety Scale, score after second treatment (crossover)

sias_pre.Description: Social Interaction and Anxiety Scale, score before treatment

sps_1y.Description: Social Phobia Scale, score at 1-year follow-up

sps_crossover.Description: Social Phobia Scale, score after first treatment

sps_post.Description: Social Phobia Scale, score after second treatment (crossover)

sps_pre.Description: Social Phobia Scale, score before treatment

spsq_1y.Description: Social Phobia Screening Questionnaire, total score at 1-year follow-up

spsq_crossover.Description: Social Phobia Screening Questionnaire, total score after second treatment (crossover)

spsq_post.Description: Social Phobia Screening Questionnaire, total score after first treatment

spsq_pre.Description: Social Phobia Screening Questionnaire, total score before treatment

sud_anticipatory_distress_1y.Description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale, distress, at 1-year follow-up

sud_anticipatory_distress_post.Description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale, distress, score after first treatment

sud_anticipatory_distress_pre.Description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale, distress, score before treatment

sud_anticipatory_fear_1y.Description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale, fear, score at 1-year follow-up

sud_anticipatory_fear_post.Description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale, fear, score after first treatment

sud_anticipatory_fear_pre.Description: Subjective Units of Distress Scale, fear, score before treatment
